field-rules.invalid-phone-number-length: The allowed length of a phone number is 10-15 digits
field-rules.password-must-at-least-eight-characters: Ensure password is of length at least 8 letters
field-rules.password-must-one-number: Ensure password least has one digit
field-rules.password-must-three-lowercase: Ensure password least has three lowercase letters
field-rules.password-must-two-uppercase: Ensure password least has two uppercase letters
